content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** *** > check out the sweet bee crochet > facebook community click here to > join 1 *** crochet this quick and colourful neck warmer using less than 1 cake of lion brand mandala and a 5mm hook this pattern is perfect for last minute gifts and market prep it looks beautiful in any colourway and the simple stitch repetition makes this an enjoyable pattern to work on it s easy to pack up in a project bag for road trips working on during the lunch hour or in the evening while watching your favourite shows **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - one cake of lion brand mandala colourway seen in photos is griffin - 5mm hook - yarn needle scissors measuring tape > **other patterns in the granny row collection ** > - * one skein granny row scarf 2 * > - two skein granny row wrap 3 ***this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products *** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/one-skein-granny-row-scarf 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/two-skein-granny-row-wrap
